text: Mowrey Beach is an organized hamlet within the Rural Municipality (RM) of Mervin No. 499 in the Canadian province of Saskatchewan. It is on the northeast shore of Brightsand Lake approximately northeast of the City of Lloydminster. == Government == While Mowrey Beach is under the jurisdiction of the RM of Mervin No. 499, it has a three-person hamlet board. == References == == External links == * Category:Mervin No. 499, Saskatchewan Category:Division No. 17, Saskatchewan Category:Organized hamlets in Saskatchewan
title: Mowrey Beach
